app module¶

Client side of Messenger app.

class app.Client(host='127.0.0.1', port=7777, bufsize=1024, client_name=None)¶

Bases: threading.Thread

Messenger client side main class.

bufsize¶

Validator for client buffersize.

connect()¶

Connect to server with host and port attributes.

get_request(action, data)¶

Get request to server. :return (dict): Dict with request body.

host¶

Validator for client host.

port¶

Validator for client port.

read()¶

Start reader thread for reading responses from server.

run()¶

Run the client.

start_reading()¶

Read response from server.

write(action, data)¶

Send compressed bytes request to server.
